detectors.description:
LINKFund.perform_withdraw(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#61-83) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- contract_token_balance == 0 (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#70)

Reentrancy in LINKFund.perform_withdraw(address) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#61-83):
	External calls:
	- contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#67)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances[msg.sender] = 0 (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#79)
	- contract_eth_value -= balances[msg.sender] (../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#76)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [LINKFund.perform_withdraw(address)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#L61-L83):
	External calls:
	- [contract_token_balance = token.balanceOf(address(this))](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#L67)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [balances[msg.sender] = 0](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#L79)
	- [contract_eth_value -= balances[msg.sender]](../../../Desktop/mainnet/2a/2ad1ce69ea75a79f6070394a1b712db14965e3b4_LINKFund.sol#L76)
